caption.p: (A) High-pressure packed bed enzyme-reactor with recirculation, equipped with high pressure pump (HPP), separators (S), heaters (H), pressure (P) and temperature control (T), and flowmeter (F) for Lipozyme®-catalyzed ethyl oleate synthesis in scCO2 [26]; (B) High-pressure enzymatic membrane reactor with recirculation (B) for biotransformations in scCO2 [27].
